ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:0.5_0: 88. The training rule on upholstered with cotton down
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.2_0: the monks from the group of six had beds and benches made upholstered with cotton down.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.3_0: When people walking about the dwellings saw this, they complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.4_0: “How can the Sakyan ascetics have beds and benches made upholstered with cotton down? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.5_0: The monks heard those people complaining,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.6_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.7_0: “How can the monks from the group of six do this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.11_0: “... Foolish men, how can you do this?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:1.14.1_0: ‘If a monk has a bed or a bench made upholstered with cotton down, it is to be stripped, and he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.6_0: there are four kinds of beds: legs and frame with detachable legs.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.8_0: there are four kinds of benches: legs, frame with legs and frame, called _masāraka_; one with detachable legs.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.10_0: there are three kinds of cotton down: cotton down from trees, cotton down from creepers, cotton down from grass.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.12_0: If he makes the blanket, or has it made, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.13_0: When he obtains it, it is to be cut down, and he is then to confess an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.14.1_0: If she finishes what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.15_0: If she has others finish what she began herself, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.16_0: If she finishes herself what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.17_0: If she has others finish what was begun by others, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.18_0: If she makes one or has one made for the benefit of someone else, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.1.19_0: If she obtains one that was made by someone else and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.2.6_0: and in the woods of Vesālī
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.2.7_0: if he is making a pillow;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.2.8_0: if he obtains one made by another and then strips it before using it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc88:2.2.11_0: The sixth rule, the training rule on upholstered with cotton down, is finished.
